categories: Category:Commerce and labor guilds and unions

nodes.text: The Artisans' Guild was a guild of glassblowers that was active on the planet Naboo during the last decades of the Galactic Republic. In 21 BBY, the Artisans' Guild became embroiled in a trade dispute after they objected to a rise in prices by the Silver Sand Consortium. In an attempt to resolve the contention, Queen Jamillia of the Naboo asked Senator Padmé Amidala to negotiate a resolution to the crisis.
